subject: Boxing
Motorcycles, Motor Bikes and Motorscooters
Traffic Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Paul Williams, a former World Boxing Organization welterweight champion, was paralyzed after his spinal cord was severed in a motorcycle crash Sunday in Marietta, Ga.
snippet: Paul Williams, a former World Boxing Organization welterweight champion, was paralyzed after his spinal cord was severed in a motorcycle crash Sunday in Marietta, Ga.
